Flow.label: Service Cloud: Email for Customer Specific Announcements

textTemplates.name: AnnouncementEmailTemplate

textTemplates.text:
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" style="width: 100%; ">
<head>
<!-- Start Marketo Variable Definitions -->
<!-- End Marketo Variable Definitions -->
<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8" />
<meta name="viewport" content="initial-scale=1.0" />
<title>NVIDIA</title>
<link href="http://info.nvidianews.com/rs/156-OFN-742/images/dinpro-regular.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />
<!--[if mso]>
<style type=”text/css”>
body {font-family: Trebuchet MS, Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif !important;}
.text-center, .btn, .remove, a.blockRight{font-family: Trebuchet MS, Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif !important;}
table {font-family: Trebuchet MS, Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif !important;}
td {font-family: Trebuchet MS, Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif !important;}
sup {font-size: 100% !important;}
</style>
<![endif]-->

table {font-family: Trebuchet MS, Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif !important;}
td {font-family: Trebuchet MS, Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif !important;}
sup {font-size: 100% !important;}
</style>
<![endif]-->

body {font-family: Trebuchet MS, Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif !important;}
.text-center, .btn, .remove, .blockRight{font-family: Trebuchet MS, Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif !important;}

td {font-family: Trebuchet MS, Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif !important;}
sup {font-size: 100% !important;}

body {font-family: Trebuchet MS, Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif !important;}
.text-center, .btn, .remove, .blockRight{font-family: Trebuchet MS, Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif !important;}

<!--[if gte mso 16]>
<style type="text/css">
body {font-family: Trebuchet MS, Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif !important;}
.text-center, .btn, .remove, .blockRight{font-family: Trebuchet MS, Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif !important;}

<style type="text/css"> @font-face {font-family: "DINPro-Regular"; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; src: local("DINPro-Regular"), url(http://www.nvidia.co.uk/content/newsletter/fonts/DINPro_Regular.woff2) format("woff2"), url(http://images.nvidia.com/newsletters/fonts/DINPro_Regular.otf) format("embedded-opentype"), url(http://images.nvidia.com/newsletters/fonts/DINPro_Regular.ttf)
format("truetype"), url(http://images.nvidia.com/newsletters/fonts/DINPro_Regular.woff) format("woff"), url(http://images.nvidia.com/newsletters/fonts/DINPro_Regular.svg) format("svg"); unicode-range: U 0 0FF, U 131, U 152 -153, U 2C6, U 2DA, U 2DC, U 2000 -206F, U 2074, U 20AC, U 2212, U 2215, U E0FF, U EFFD, U F000} @media only screen and (max-width: 640px) {body { width: auto }
table[class="container"] { width: 100%; padding-left: 20px; padding-right: 20px } table[class="container-banner"] { width: 90%; text-align: center; align-content: center } img[class="image-100-percent"], img[class="small-image-100-percent"] { width: 100%; height: auto } img[class="image-100-percent"] { max-width: 100% !important; min-width: 124px !important } img[class="small-image-100-percent"]
{ width: 100%; height: auto; max-width: 100% !important; min-width: 124px } table[class="full-width"], table[class="btn"] { width: 100%; min-width: 124px !important } table[class="full-width-center"], td[class="full-width-center"] { width: 100%; text-align: center !important } table[class="full-width-view-online"], td[class="full-width-view-online"], a[class="full-width-view-online"] { width:
100%; background-color: rgb(118, 185, 0) !important; font-size: 12px !important; line-height: 12px !important; text-transform: none !important; border-left: 0px !important; font-weight: bold !important; text-align: center !important; min-width: 124px !important } table[class="full-width-logo"], td[class="full-width-logo"] { width: 95%; padding-left: 30%; padding-right: 30%; padding-top: 5px;
align-content: center } td[class="var-height"] { height: 20px } td[class="vspace"] { height: 20px } table[class="col-2"], table[class="col-3"] { width: 100%; margin-right: 0 } table[class="col-3-last"], table[class="col-2-last"], table[class="full-width"] { width: 100%; min-width: 124px !important } td[class="text-center"], div[class="text-center"] { text-align: center !important }
table[class="remove"], td[class="remove"], tr[class="remove"] { display: none; width: 0px; line-height: 0px; height: 0px } table[class="fix-box"], td[class="fix-box"] { padding-left: 20px; padding-right: 20px } table[class="space-scale"] { width: 100%; float: none } table[class="blockCenter"], td[class="blockCenter"] { text-align: center; width: 100% } } @media only screen and (max-width: 479px)
{body { font-size: 10px } table[class="container"] { width: 100%; padding-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px } table[class="container-banner"] { width: 90%; text-align: center; align-content: center } td[class="var-height"] { height: 20px } td[class="vspace"] { display: none; width: 0px; line-height: 0px; height: 0px } img[class="image-100-percent"], img[class="small-image-100-percent"] { width:
100%; height: auto; max-width: 100% !important; min-width: 124px !important } table[class="col-2"], table[class="col-3"] { width: 100%; margin-right: 0 } table[class="col-3-last"], table[class="col-2-last"], table[class="full-width"] { width: 100%; min-width: 124px !important } table[class="full-width-center"], td[class="full-width-center"] { width: 100%; text-align: center !important }
table[class="full-width-view-online"], td[class="full-width-view-online"], a[class="full-width-view-online"] { width: 100%; background-color: rgb(118, 185, 0) !important; font-size: 12px !important; line-height: 12px !important; text-transform: none !important; border-left: 0px !important; font-weight: bold !important; text-align: center !important; min-width: 124px !important }
table[class="full-width-logo"], td[class="full-width-logo"] { width: 95%; padding-left: 20%; padding-right: 20%; padding-top: 5px; align-content: center } table[class="clear-padding"], td[class="clear-padding"] { padding: 0 } table[class="fix-box"], td[class="fix-box"] { padding-left: 0; padding-right: 0 } } </style>
</head>
<body bgcolor="#ededed" style="-webkit-text-size-adjust: none; -ms-text-size-adjust: none; margin: 0; padding: 0; font-family: "DINPro-Regular", Trebuchet MS, Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif !important; font-size:12px;background-color:#ededed;">
<!-- start 100% wrapper (black background) -->
<table width="100%" id="mainStructure" align="center" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" bgcolor="#ededed" style="border-spacing: 0; font-size:12px;background-color:#ededed;" class="mktoContainer">
<tr align="center" id="block1OuterHeaderSpacerBlock" class="mktoModule">
<td align="center" class="fix-box" style="border-collapse: collapse; ">
<!-- start header view online container width 640px -->
<table width="640" align="center" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" class="container" style="border-spacing: 0; ">
<!-- start space height -->
<tbody>
<tr align="center">
<td height="20" class="vspace" style="border-collapse: collapse; "></td>
</tr>
<!-- end space height -->
</tbody>
</table>
<!-- end header view online container width 640px --> </td>
</tr>
<tr align="center" id="block2HeaderBlock" class="mktoModule">
<td align="center" class="fix-box" style="border-collapse: collapse; ">
<table width="640" align="center" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" class="full-width" style="border-spacing: 0; border-left:1px solid #aaaaaa;border-right:1px solid #aaaaaa;border-top:1px solid #aaaaaa;">
<tbody>
<tr align="center">
<td align="center" width="640" style="border-collapse: collapse; ">
<table height="50" width="640" align="center" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" class="full-width" bgcolor="#76b900" style="border-spacing: 0; background-color:#76b900; border-bottom:1px solid #aaaaaa">
<tbody>
<tr align="center">
<td align="center" width="640" bgcolor="#76b900" style="border-collapse: collapse; vertical-align:text-top; height:50px; position:relative;" height="100%">
<!-- start content left -->
<!-- start content left -->
<table width="410" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align="left" class="full-width" style="border-spacing: 0; min-width:410px">
<!--start space height -->
<tbody>
<tr align="center">
<td height="17" class="var-height" colspan="2" style="border-collapse: collapse; "></td>
</tr>
<!--end space height -->
<tr align="center">
<td class="remove" height="20" width="20" style="border-collapse: collapse; font-size:0;line-height:0;border-collapse:collapse;"> </td>
<td align="left" width="390" class="full-width-logo" style="border-collapse: collapse; ">
<div class="mktoImg" id="NVLogoImage" mktolockimgsize="false">
<a href="http://www.nvidia.com" target="_blank"> <img class="image-100-percent" src="http://info.nvidianews.com/rs/156-OFN-742/images/NVIDIA-Corporate-Header.png" height="22" width="119" alt="NVIDIA" style="font-family: 'DINPro-Regular', Trebuchet MS, Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; color: #ffffff; font-style: bold; font-size: 18px; line-height: 18px; display: block;" border="0" hspace="0" vspace="0" /> </a>
</div>
</td>
</tr>
<!--start space height -->
<tr align="center">
<td height="16" class="var-height" colspan="2" style="border-collapse: collapse; "></td>
</tr>
<!--end space height -->
<!-- end text content -->
</tbody>
</table>
<!-- end content left -->
<!-- start content right -->
<table width="200" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align="right" class="full-width-view-online" style="border-spacing: 0; background-color:#76b900;font-size:11px;line-height:11px; color:#ffffff;text-align:center; font-weight:bold;min-width:200px; font-family:'DINPro-Regular', Trebuchet MS, Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif;">
<!--start space height -->
<tbody>
<tr align="center">
<td height="15" class="full-width-view-online" colspan="3" style="border-collapse: collapse; "></td>
</tr>
<!--end space height -->
<tr align="center">
<td class="remove" height="23" width="20" style="border-collapse: collapse; font-size:0;line-height:0;border-collapse:collapse;"> </td>
<td align="left" width="160" style="border-collapse: collapse; font-size:13px;line-height:17px;font-family:'DINPro-Regular', Trebuchet MS, Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; color:#000000;text-align:right; font-weight:normal" class="full-width-view-online"> </td>
<td class="remove" height="23" width="20" style="border-collapse: collapse; font-size:0;line-height:0;border-collapse:collapse;"> </td>
</tr>
<!--start space height -->
<tr align="center">
<td height="15" class="full-width-view-online" colspan="3" style="border-collapse: collapse; "></td>
</tr>
<!--end space height -->
<!-- end text content -->
</tbody>
</table>
<!-- end content right --> </td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</td>
</tr>
<!-- END IMAGE HEADER LAYOUT-->
<!--START FULL WIDTH BANNER BLOCK -->
<tr align="center">
<td class="full-width" width="640" align="center" style="border-collapse: collapse; ">
<!-- start header container -->
<table width="640" align="center" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" class="full-width" style="border-spacing: 0; background-color:#ededed;min-width:640px">
<tbody>
<tr align="center">
<td align="center" style="border-collapse: collapse; ">
<div class="mktoImg" id="BannerImage" mktolockimgsize="true" mktolockimgstyle="true">
<img class="image-100-percent" width="640" style="display: block; height: auto; display:block;min-width:640px;" border="0" hspace="0" vspace="0" />
</div>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<!-- end header container -->
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</td>
</tr>
<tr align="center" id="Block3GreenDividerBlock" class="mktoModule">
<td class="fix-box" style="border-collapse: collapse; ">
<table align="center" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" class="full-width" style="border-spacing: 0; ">
<tbody>
<tr align="center">
<td class="full-width" width="640" align="center" style="border-collapse: collapse; ">
<!-- start divider container -->
<table width="640" align="center" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" class="full-width" style="border-spacing: 0; background-color:#ededed;min-width:640px">
<tbody>
<tr align="center">
<td height="13" style="border-collapse: collapse; font-size:1px; line-height:1px;" align="center"><img class="image-100-percent" src="http://info.nvidianews.com/rs/156-OFN-742/images/green-divider-640.png" width="640" height="13" alt="" style="display: block; height: auto; max-height:13px;min-height:13px;display:block;font-size:1px; line-height:1px;" border="0" hspace="0" vspace="0" /> </td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<!-- end divider container -->
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</td>
</tr>
<tr align="center" id="bodyLeftCopyBlockdb635536-5c69-442d-b4a6-5c59f7f8fc69" class="mktoModule">
<td align="center" class="fix-box" style="border-collapse: collapse; ">
<!-- start full width block 1 container width 640px -->
<table width="640" align="center" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" class="container" bgcolor="#ffffff" style="border-spacing: 0; background-color:#ffffff;border-left:1px solid #aaaaaa;border-right:1px solid #aaaaaa;">
<tbody>
<tr align="center">
<td align="center" style="border-collapse: collapse; ">
<!-- start full width block 1 container width 560px -->
<table width="580" align="center" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" class="full-width" style="border-spacing: 0; ">
<!--start space height -->
<tbody>
<!--end space height -->
<tr>
<td style="border-collapse: collapse; font-size:13px;line-height:17px;font-family:'DINPro-Regular', Trebuchet MS, Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif;color:#000000;font-weight:normal;padding: 30px 0;" class="text-center">
Hello,
<br /><br />
This is a new NVIDIA announcment for {!AccountName}
<br /><br />
Please review the following {!AnnouncementTitle} announcement.
<br /><br />
<!--a href="{!AnnouncementURL}"style ="display: block; margin: 20px 0; width: 150px; padding: 15px; text-align: center; color: white; background-color: #76b900; text-transform: uppercase;text-decoration: none;">Announcement Link</a-->
<span style ="display: block; margin: 20px 0; width: 150px; padding: 15px; text-align: center; color: #76b900; text-transform: uppercase;text-decoration: none;">{!AnnouncementURL}</span>
<br /><br />
Thank you in advance for your time,<br />
NVIDIA Enterprise Support Service Team
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table> </td>
</tr>
<!-- end text content -->
</tbody>
</table>
<!-- end full width block 1 container width 560px -->
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<!-- end full width block 1 container width 560px --> </td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<!-- end full width block 1 container width 640px --> </td>
</tr>
<tr align="center" id="block42OuterHeaderSpacerBlock" class="mktoModule">
<td align="center" class="fix-box" style="border-collapse: collapse; ">
<!-- start outer top space container width 640px -->
<table width="640" align="center" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" class="container" style="border-spacing: 0; border-bottom:2px solid #76b900;border-top:1px solid #aaaaaa;">
<!-- start space height -->
<tbody>
<tr align="center">
<td height="12" style="border-collapse: collapse; "></td>
</tr>
<!-- end space height -->
</tbody>
</table>
<!-- end outer bottom space container width 640px --> </td>
</tr>
<tr align="center" id="block44FullWidthFooterBlock" class="mktoModule">
<td align="center" class="fix-box">
<!-- start footer block container width 640px -->
<table width="640" align="center" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" class="container" style="border-left:1px solid #aaaaaa;border-right:1px solid #aaaaaa;border-bottom:1px solid #aaaaaa;background-color:#ffffff;">
<tbody>
<tr align="center">
<td align="center">
<!-- start footer block container width 560px -->
<table width="580" align="center" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" class="full-width">
<!--start space height -->
<tbody>
<tr align="center">
<td height="15"></td>
</tr>
<!--end space height -->
<!-- start text content -->
<tr align="center">
<td>
<table width="100%" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align="center">
<tbody>
<tr align="center">
<td style="font-size:11px;line-height:14px;font-family:'DINPro-Regular', Trebuchet MS, Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif;color:#949494;text-align:center" class="text-center"><span class="mktoText" id="block44FooterText">
<div></div></span></td>
</tr>
<!--start space height -->
<tr align="center">
<td height="15"></td>
</tr>
<!--end space height -->
<tr align="center">
<td style="font-size:11px;line-height:14px;font-family:'DINPro-Regular', Trebuchet MS, Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif;color:#000000;text-align:center;" class="text-center"><span class="mktoText" id="block44FooterLine1Text">
<div>
© 2018 NVIDIA Corporation. All rights reserved.<br />
NVIDIA Corporation, 2788 San Tomas Expressway, Santa Clara, CA 95051
</div></span></td>
</tr>
<!--start space height -->
<tr align="center" class="remove">
<td height="5"></td>
</tr>
<!--end space height -->
</tbody>
</table> </td>
</tr>
<!-- end text content -->
<!--start space height -->
<tr align="center">
<td height="25"></td>
</tr>
<!--end space height -->
</tbody>
</table>
<!-- end footer block container width 560px --> </td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<!-- end footer block container width 640px --> </td>
</tr>
<tr align="center&
